languages.text: "Много еще было у меня славных побед, недаром ярл даровал мне почести терминатора". {n}Астартес с гордостью демонстрирует знак на груди — каменную печать в виде волчьего черепа, лежащего поверх креста.{/n}

"And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Много еще было у меня славных побед, недаром ярл даровал мне почести терминатора". {n}Астартес с гордостью демонстрирует знак на груди — каменную печать в виде волчьего черепа, лежащего поверх креста.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the Jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator and inducted me into the brotherhood of the Void Claws." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

"And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the Jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator and inducted me into the brotherhood of the Void Claws." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

"And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the Jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator and inducted me into the brotherhood of the Void Claws." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

"And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

languages.text: «Y hay numerosas otras victorias gloriosas. No me gané el cargo de Exterminador por parte de mi jarl por cruzarme de brazos». {n}Muestra orgulloso el símbolo que adorna su pecho: un sello de piedra con forma de cabeza de lobo sobre una cruz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y hay numerosas otras victorias gloriosas. No me gané el cargo de Exterminador por parte de mi jarl por cruzarme de brazos». {n}Muestra orgulloso el símbolo que adorna su pecho: un sello de piedra con forma de cabeza de lobo sobre una cruz.{/n}

languages.text: “除此之外，我还取得了许多辉煌的战绩。领主授予我的‘终结者’称号并非徒有虚名。”{n}他自豪地展示着胸前的徽章——一枚印有狼头形状的十字架形石印。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，我还取得了许多辉煌的战绩。领主授予我的‘终结者’称号并非徒有虚名。”{n}他自豪地展示着胸前的徽章——一枚印有狼头形状的十字架形石印。{/n}

languages.text: 「俺の輝かしい勝利は他にもたくさんある。ヤールは俺に滅殺者の栄誉を与えてくれた」{n}彼は誇らしげに胸の印章、つまり十字架の上に狼の頭の形をした石の印章を掲げている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺の輝かしい勝利は他にもたくさんある。ヤールは俺に滅殺者の栄誉を与えてくれた」{n}彼は誇らしげに胸の印章、つまり十字架の上に狼の頭の形をした石の印章を掲げている。{/n}

languages.text: « Et ce n'est là qu'un bref aperçu de mes glorieuses victoires. Ce n'est pas pour rien que le jarl m'a décerné le titre de Terminator. » {n}Il exhibe fièrement l'insigne apposé sur sa poitrine, une croix surmontée d'un sceau de pierre en forme de tête de loup.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et ce n'est là qu'un bref aperçu de mes glorieuses victoires. Ce n'est pas pour rien que le jarl m'a décerné le titre de Terminator. » {n}Il exhibe fièrement l'insigne apposé sur sa poitrine, une croix surmontée d'un sceau de pierre en forme de tête de loup.{/n}

languages.text: "Und von meinen glorreichen Siegen gibt es noch viele weitere — nicht umsonst hat der Jarl mich zum Terminator ernannt." {n}Er zeigt stolz das steinerne Siegel auf seiner Brust, einen Wolfskopf über einem Kreuz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und von meinen glorreichen Siegen gibt es noch viele weitere — nicht umsonst hat der Jarl mich zum Terminator ernannt." {n}Er zeigt stolz das steinerne Siegel auf seiner Brust, einen Wolfskopf über einem Kreuz.{/n}

languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

languages.text: "Daha anlatmadığım nice şanlı zaferim var. Ee, yarldan Mahveden mükâfatını boşuna almadık." {n}Gururla göğsündeki sembolü gösteriyor. Sembol, bir çarpının üzerinde kurt başına sahip taş bir mühürden oluşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And of my glorious victories there are many more besides — not for nothing did the jarl grant me the accolade of Terminator." {n}He proudly displays the sigil on his chest — a stone seal in the shape of a wolf head on top of a cross.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sana anlatmadığım daha birçok şanlı zaferim var, jarl bana Mahveden mükâfatını boşuna vermedi." {n}Gururla göğsündeki sembolü gösteriyor. Sembol, bir çarpının üzerinde kurt başına sahip taş bir mühürden oluşuyor.{/n}
